mapper.select: select * from ( select row_number() over(order by actorPopularity desc) as rank_no, r.actorPopularity, a.* from popcorn.rankactor r, popcorn.actor a where r.actorId = a.actorId) top where rank_no = #{rank_no}
mapper.insert: insert into popcorn.rankactor (actorId) select a.actorId from popcorn.actor a left outer join popcorn.rankactor r on a.actorId = r.actorId where r.actorId is null
